channel.title: untitled blog
channel.description: A junior developer's musings, explorations, and learnings of all things technology.

item.title: Obligatory "Hello World" post
item.description: Look! I actually made progress on a side project! I started this blog — entitled “untitled blog” until I can think of a name I like — not…
item.content:encoded:
Look! I actually made progress on a side project!

I started this blog — entitled “untitled blog” until I can think of a name I like — not only as a way to communicate and hold myself accountable for what I am learning, mulling over, and experiencing.

What I hope to accomplish here

☀️ Document my own learning, thoughts, and experiences
☀️ Learn more about GatsbyJS & specifically GraphQL
☀️ Achieve one of my 2019 goals

How I hope to accomplish the above

☁️ Write and publish pieces once every week
☁️ Alternate the topic / method of each written pieces
☁️ Maintain self-accountability

Major ups to GatsbyJS and their amazing docs that allowed me to get up and running almost immediately. A post in the very near future will be about my experience working with Gatsby and my thoughts, etc.

Without further adieu, I leave you with an adorable pupper gif while I continue working on this blog!
